job.title: Frontend Developer
job.description: ltpgtShortList Recruitment are working with a Nationwide Real Estate company in the Austin area who are looking to bring in a Software Engineer to help their continued growth This developer would get the ability to enhance their current platform by adapting existing features and creating new ones to solve technical issues ltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtTasks ltpgtltulgtltligtWork effectively with a team of 8 other BackendFrontend Developers and QAs to build an amazing software productltligtltligtBuild software primarily using ReactJS or AngularltligtltligtWork and communicate effectively in a team environmentltligtltligtThoughtful in code reviews with the ability to contribute and the desire to learnltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtDesired Skills and Experience ltpgtltulgtltligt5 years of software development experienceltligtltligtExperience with HTML5 CSS JavaScript and objectoriented programming languages ltligtltligtExperience with ReactJS or AngularJS is required ltligtltligtExperience with RESTful APIsltligtltligtExperience with Unit Testing is a plusltligtltligtExperience with Azure Cloud is a plus ltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtThis position would be paying a Competitive Salary plus a fantastic benefits package The ideal candidate is located in Austin TXltpgt
